name: Regen
text: Restore a set amount of HP for a certain duration

name: Instant Heal
text: Instantly restore a set amount of HP

name: ATK ↑
text: Increase ATK

name: DEF ↑
text: Increase DEF

name: AGL ↑
text: Increase AGL

name: CRT ↑
text: Increase CRT

name: Skill Charge ↑
text: Increase Skill Gauge charge amount; Stacks with Skill Gauge charge acceleration

name: Immune
text: Grant Immunity to all debuff effects; Immediately removes all debuffs

name: Immortal
text: HP will not fall below 1, even after taking lethal damage

name: Vampirism
text: Gradually recovers a certain percent of damage after executing an attack

name: Revive
text: Immediately revives a dead Child

name: Skill Charge Acceleration
text: Accelerates Skill Gauge Charge Speed; Stacks with effects that increase Skill Gauge charge amount

name: Heal ↑
text: Increase the effect of heal skills

name: Skill DEF↑
text: Increase DEF against all types of skills

name: Skill Boost II
text: Increase the Final Blow of a skill; Cannot be applied to Auto Attacks, Drive skills, or duration effects

name: Max HP ↑
text: Sets up a barrier, granting additional HP

name: Tap Skill Boost II
text: Increase the Final Blow of a Tap Skill

name: Slide Skill Boost II
text: Increase the Final Blow of a Slide Skill

name: Drive Skill Boost II
text: Increase the Final Blow of a Drive Skill

name: CRT Rate ↑
text: Increase the rate of critical attacks

name: Skill Boost
text: Strengthens a skill; Cannot be applied to Auto Attacks or Drive Skills

name: Drive Charge ↑
text: Increase Drive Skill gauge charge amount

name: EVA↑
text: Increase EVA against skills

name: Debuff EVA ↑
text: Increase EVA against debuff effects

name: Reflect
text: Reflects a certain amount of damage back at the opponent; Does not reflect Drive Skills or durational damage

name: Weak Point DEF ↑
text: Increase DEF against Weak Point attacks

name: Critical ATK ↑
text: Increase the Final Blow of a critical attack

name: Weak Point ATK ↑
text: Increase the damage of Weak Point attacks

name: Regen ↑
text: Increase the effect of regen skills

name: Auto Attack Boost
text: Strengthens Auto Attacks

name: Tap Skill Boost
text: Strengthens Tap Skills

name: Slide Skill Boost
text: Strengthens Slide Skills

name: Enrage
text: Stores durational damage taken and adds it to the next skill attack

name: Drive Skill Boost
text: Strengthens the effect of Drive Skills

name: Tap Skill DEF ↑
text: Increase DEF against Tap Skills

name: Slide Skill DEF ↑
text: Increase DEF against Slide Skills

name: Debuff Duration Cut
text: Decrease debuff duration

name: Taunt
text: Taunt the enemy and takes all attacks directed at allies, except for attacks that target all Allies

name: HP Transfusion
text: Distributes a percentage of HP to allies

name: Tap Skill Barrage
text: Execute multiple Tap Skills

name: Bonus Damage
text: Deals Bonus Damage

name: Penetrate
text: Deal damage while ignoring DEF

name: HP Drain
text: Recovers a certain percent of damage after executing an attack

name: Skill Charge Addition
text: Instantly recharges a certain amount of the Skill Gauge

name: Drive Skill Addition
text: Instantly recharges a certain amount of the Drive gauge

name: Double-edged Sword
text: Increase ATK while decreasing DEF

name: Skill DEF↑
text: Increase DEF against all types of skills

name: Cleanse
text: Instantly remove all debuff effects

name: Drive Skill DEF ↑
text: Increase DEF against Drive Skills

name: ATK-DEF Switch
text: Switches the target's ATK and DEF while in effect

name: Full Charge
text: Instantly fully charges the Skill Gauge (Chance to activate)

name: Cooldown Reduced
text: Decrease the cooldown time of the target's Slide Skills over a certain period of time

name: Focus
text: During the effect duration, attacks will become critical attacks and will not miss; Immune to Blind and anything that negatively affects critical attacks

name: Life Link
text: Recovers a certain percentage of damage taken and bestows it on the ally with the lowest HP

name: Battlecry
text: Increase ATK proportional to the number of buffs (stacked up to 3 times)

name: Silence RES ↑
text: (Item options and Battle Buffs possible)

name: Poison DMG ↓
text: (Item options and Battle Buffs possible)

name: Ranged Attack
text: Deal damage while ignoring enemy substitutes or Reflect effects

name: Debuff Remove
text: Remove one debuff effect

name: Fortitude
text: Nullifies damage and decrease frequency for damaging debuffs

name: Frenzy
text: Increase ATK and nullifies all attacks and debuffs. 100% chance of being stunned for 5 seconds after the effect

name: Nullify Sleep Debuff
text: Nullifies Sleep debuff

name: Nullify Silence Debuff
text: Nullify Silence Debuff

name: Remove Confuse Debuff
text: Remove recent skill debuff

name: Nullify Stun
text: Nullifies Stun

name: Nullify Petrify
text: Nullify Petrify

name: Remove Freeze Debuff
text: Remove recent skill debuff

name: Nullify Disable Debuff
text: Nullify Petrify, Silence, Confuse, Stun, Sleep, and Smite

name: Remove DOT Debuff
text: Remove recent skill debuff

name: Remove Skill Damage Debuff
text: Remove recent skill debuff

name: Nullify Skill DEF Debuff
text: Nullify Skill DEF Debuff

name: Remove Petrify+Freeze debuffs
text: Remove recent skill debuff

name: Barrier
text: Generates Barrier (absorbs damage before HP is affected) and takes damage for other targets

name: Purify
text: Converts Bleed into regen

name: Aid
text: Increase Weak Point Skill Damage and increase ATK based on the number of buffs

name: Bleed Damage ↑
text: Increase Bleed damage to enemy

name: Rebirth
text: When HP falls to 0, instantly revives with a certain percentage of HP, a fully charged Skill Gauge, and increased attack

name: Debuff Barrier
text: Creates a separate shield that absorbs damage from Debuffs

name: Combo
text: Kills an enemy and grant instant Bonus Damage to remaining enemies

name: Overload
text: Increase skill cooldown time in place of increasing damage to all skills except Drive Skills and Skill Charge Speed decrease

name: Direct Hit
text: Ignore enemy Fortitude

name: Awaken
text: Increase Critical Damage, and further increase Slide Skill damage based on number of ally buffs.

name: Remove Curse
text: Remove the Curse debuff.

name: Secret Heal
text: Recover user's HP every time user acts or takes damage.

name: Nullify Recovery Block
text: Remove the Recovery Block debuff.

name: Petrifying Touch
text: Have a chance to Petrify enemies that attack user.

name: Sharp Sword
text: Increase Weak Point skill damage based on number of Light Type Allies.

name: Antidote
text: Remove Poison and instantly heal damage dealt by 1 round of Poison.

name: Poetic Justice II
text: Recover HP based on number of ally buffs.

name: Remove Burn and Scald
text: Remove the Burn and Scald debuffs.

name: Remove Water Balloon
text: Remove the Water Balloon debuff.

name: Patience
text: Grant current number of Debuff +1 Fortitude

name: Pain Adaptation
text: Raises DEF a certain amount. Raise DEF 4% for every 2% of HP lost by all Allies (160% max, increases only DEF granted by Pain Adaptation)

name: Pain Sublimation
text: Raises ATK a certain amount. Raise ATK 60% for every 2% of HP lost by all Allies (2400% max, increases only ATK granted by Pain Sublimation)

name: Remove Death Heal
text: Remove Death Heal Debuff

name: Increases DoT Evasion
text: Increases DoT Debuff Evasion

name: Offensive Stance
text: Only Childs with Offensive Stance can use Fever attacks in Fever Mode

name: Ignore Reflect
text: Attack ignoring enemy's Reflect while in effect

name: Remove Snow Bomb
text: Removes the Snow Bomb debuff

name: Max HP ↑
text: +HP Gain

name: Increase Debuff ACC
text: Increase Target's Debuff ACC

name: Revitalize
text: For Allies with Revitalize, once only, revive the first Ally to die and Heal HP

name: Debuff Taunt
text: Receive 2 debuffs in place of 1 debuff attack from the Enemy

name: Time Twist
text: Removes all of target's time-based debuffs, and increases Skill Gauge charge speed by 40%.

name: Increase Poison Damage
text: Increase Poison damage used by Target

name: Ice Shield
text: Increase DEF and decrease attacker's Skill Gauge Charge Speed when attacked

name: Ice Shield
text: Increase DEF and decrease attacker's Skill Gauge Charge Speed when attacked

name: Remove and Nullify Allure
text: Remove Allure and nullify it for duration

name: Increase Curse Damage
text: Increases damage of Curse used by target

name: ATK ↓
text: Decrease ATK

name: DEF ↓
text: Decrease DEF

name: AGL ↓
text: Decrease AGL

name: Bleed
text: Deal continuous damage to an enemy

name: Confuse
text: Randomly attacks an ally instead of an enemy; Durational damage is applied, but does not affect durational Drive effects or revival

name: Skill Charge ↓
text: Decrease Skill Gauge charge amount; Stacks with Skill Gauge charge deceleration

name: Sleep
text: Makes it impossible to act and reduces DEF to 0; The effect is removed upon taking damage from any skill other than an Auto Attack

name: CRT Rate ↓
text: Decrease CRT Rate

name: Skill Charge ↓
text: Decrease Skill Gauge Charge Speed; Stacks with effects that decrease Skill Gauge charge amount

name: Heal ↓
text: Decrease the effect of heal skills

name: Drive Skill Weakening II
text: Decrease the Final Blow of a Drive Skill

name: Debuff EVA ↓
text: Decrease EVA against debuff effects

name: Weak Point ATK Weakening II
text: Decrease the damage of Weak Point attacks

name: Critical Weakening II
text: Decrease the Final Blow of a critical attack

name: Regen ↓
text: Decrease the effect of regen skills

name: Weak Point DEF ↓
text: Decrease DEF against Weak Point attacks

name: Tap Skill DEF ↓
text: Decrease DEF against Tap Skills

name: Slide Skill DEF ↓
text: Decrease DEF against Slide Skills

name: Debuff Extension
text: Extends debuff duration

name: Poison
text: Receives damage with each action

name: Skill Charge ↓
text: Instantly decrease a certain amount of the Skill Gauge

name: Drive Skill ↓
text: Instantly decrease a certain amount of the Drive Gauge

name: Recovery Block
text: Makes it impossible to recover with any recovery skills

name: Death Heal
text: Inverts the healing effects of heal and regen and converts them into instant damage or continuous damage; Vampirism effects and absorb effects do not deal damage, but also do not heal

name: Blind
text: Decrease skill accuracy

name: Petrify
text: Makes it impossible to act until receiving a certain number of attacks

name: ATK-DEF Switch
text: Switches the target's ATK and DEF while in effect

name: Debuff Blast
text: Remove a debuff and deal damage

name: Skill DEF↓
text: Decrease DEF against all types of skills

name: Cooldown Increased
text: Increase the cooldown time of the target's Slide Skills over a certain period of time

name: Necrosis
text: Deal continuous damage

name: Stun
text: Increase Stun duration when stunned targets are attacked (stunned for 1 second more when attacked, up to 5 seconds max)

name: Silence
text: When slienced the Skill Gauge resets and the cooldown timer stops counting down

name: Freeze
text: Decrease Skill Gauge Charge Speed and charge amount while inflicting added debuff effects to Bleed and Poison

name: Venom
text: DoT Damage & recovery amount (Heal, Regen) -50%, unable to cut or extend debuff

name: Graze
text: Increase continuous Bleed damage amount and duration

name: Reduce Growth Buffs
text: Reduces stacked Growth Buffs times on target by a set number of times

name: Curse
text: Deal continuous damage, followed by bonus damage when the debuff ends or is removed.

name: Curse Amplifier
text: Increase Curse duration and continuous damage.

name: Time Alteration
text: Remove one enemy time-related buff, and reduce Skill Gauge charge speed.

name: Tsunami
text: Deal damage to enemies based on number of Water Type Allies.

name: Anti-Barrier
text: Remove Barrier and deal damage based on amount of Barrier remaining.

name: Fortitude Explosion
text: Remove Fortitude and deal damage based on number of turns remaining.

name: Brand
text: Deal continuous damage based on number of enemy buffs.

name: Poetic Justice I
text: Deal continuous damage based on number of enemy debuffs.

name: Rend
text: Deal damage to the target, plus bonus damage if bleeding or poisoned.

name: Burn
text: Inflict Bleed every time target is attacked or has DEF reduced.

name: Water Balloon
text: Take damage when attacking, and reset Skill Gauge when duration or turn ends.

name: Dancing Blade
text: Decrease the target's DEF and deal damage over time

name: Allure
text: Nullify effects of buffs on target, cannot be removed except by specific removal skills

name: Marked
text: Change target of Damage Skill from Enemy to Marked Child

name: Hellfire
text: Deals damage to enemies based on number of Fire Type Allies

name: Decrease DoT Damage
text: Reduce damage from enemies' DoT Debuffs

name: Remove Fortitude
text: Remove enemy Fortitude

name: Skill Reset
text: Instantly decrease the Skill Gauge to 0

name: Snow Bomb
text: When debuff duration ends, deal a certain amount of damage and reset Enemy Skill Gauge

name: Decrease Debuff ACC
text: Decrease Target's Debuff ACC

name: Venom Amplifier
text: Increases Venom DoT Damage by 300, recovery amount -30%

name: Dark Descent
text: Deals damage to enemies based on number of Dark Type Allies

name: Recovery Buff Blast
text: Remove 1 Recovery Buff from target and deal damage based on its effect

name: Damage Resonance
text: Deal a certain amount of the Damage done to target to another Enemy that is not the target

name: Buff Steal
text: Steal the buffs applied to an enemy and grant them to the user

name: Overgrowth
text: Decrease DEF against Weak Point attacks based on number of Wood Type Allies

name: Burn
text: Lowers Skill Damage DEF & inflicts Scald every time it is attacked.

name: Watersnake
text: Skill Gauge Charge Amount -40% and deal Damage when attacked by Water Type Enemies (if debuffed target is Fire Type, deal +40% Damage; if Wood Type deal -40% Damage)

name: Wind Blast
text: Deals Damage to enemies based on number of Wood Type Allies

name: none
icon: Deal additional Damage for each buff on the target (max 8 buffs)

name: Debuff Extension
text: Extends debuff duration (except for Petrify, Water Balloon, Necrosis, Venom)

name: Corrosion
text: Deals DoT Damage based on number of target's debuffs

name: Remove Recovery Buff
text: Remove recent skill buff

name: Nullify Time-Based Buff
text: Nullify time-based buff

name: Remove Enrage
text: Removes Enrage

name: Buff Remove
text: Remove one buff effect

name: Fixed Damage
text: Non-buff/non-debuff fixed damage

name: Skill Gauge Charge Upon Critical
text: When an ally's recovery skill is critical, it charges the target's Skill Gauge.

name: EVA↑
text: Increase EVA against skills

name: Critical Fixed Damage
text: When a critical hit lands on an enemy, deal Fixed Damage.

name: Time-Based Fixed Damage
text: If you have a time-based buff, deal Fixed Damage to the enemy.

name: Vampirism Upon Critical
text: When a critical hit lands on an enemy, gain Vampirism.

name: Stun
text: Makes it impossible to act
